PERT

On this page

Work Breakdown Structure ​

1. Project Initiation - 42 hours ​

1.1. Requirements validation from existing system - 7 hours ​

1.2. Defined refined project scope and acceptance criteria - 14 hours ​

1.3. Create development timeline and sprint planning - 14 hours ​

1.4. Review existing schema and code structure - 7 hours ​

2. Development - 140 hours ​

2.1. Event Creation and Management - 14 hours ​

2.1.1. Review and rewrite Event Create/Edit/ Delete functionality - 7 hours ​

2.1.2. Event closing/ locking after completion - 5 hours ​

2.1.3. Improve views for Event Details page - 2 hours ​

2.2. Donor Registration and Blood Donation Logging - 22 hours ​

2.2.1. Add new donor entry and duplicate prevention check - 8 hours ​

2.2.2. Auto-bag number generator for each blood donation - 8 hours ​

2.2.3. Optimize "add new donor" workflow for fast data entry - 6 hours ​

2.3. Laboratory Screening and Blood Test Entry - 18 hours ​

2.3.1. Test entry workflow (HIV, HCV, HBsAg, VDRL) - 6 hours ​

2.3.2. Auto Pass/ Fail status + rejected unit logic - 12 hours ​

2.4. Component Separation - 16 hours ​

2.4.1. Component separation = auto creation of RCC/ FFP/ Platelets - 6 hours ​

2.4.2. Validate expiry date generation based on shelf life - 6 hours ​

2.4.3. Restrict separation edits after completion - 4 hours ​

2.5. Stock Inventory - 4 hours ​

2.5.1. Real-time component-level stock updates - 4 hours ​

2.6. Cross-Match for Patient/ Blood Request - 11 hours ​

2.6.1. Cross-match validation logic (blood group compatibility) - 8 hours ​

2.6.2. Prevent duplicate use of a separated unit - 3 hours ​

2.7. Blood Issue/ Hospital Transfer - 20 hours ​

2.7.1. Blood issue request + approva workflow - 8 hours ​

2.7.2. Undo/ cancel logic with safe rollback to stock - 8 hours ​

2.7.3. Add hospital record linkage - 4 hours ​

2.8. Billing & Invoice Generation - 28 hours ​

2.8.1. Billing Setup - 7 hours ​

2.8.2. Billing templates - 7 hours ​

2.8.3. Dynamic invoice generation - 7 hours ​

2.8.4. Prevent invoice editing after payment completion - 7 hours ​

2.9. Report & Analytics - 7 hours ​

2.9.1. Monthly billing reports for hospitals and events - 7 hours ​

3. Testing - 21 hours ​

3.1. Functional and integration testing for all flows ​

4. Deployment/ Update - 7 hours ​

4.1. GitHub workflow cleanup and production deployment ​
